quotes: Engagement proceeded in two phases: in the ‘listening’ phase, in the autumn of 2018, the Panel actively collected stakeholders’ concerns and ideas on digital cooperation.
In the spring of 2019, the focus shifted to ‘road-testing’ the Panel’s emerging recommendations.
In October 2018, an open Call for Contributions was launched;

time_markers.text: by January 2019, when the call closed
quotes: by January 2019, when the call closed, 167 stakeholders had sent written submissions.
